name: Junkie Spaceman
description:
It is a space western. You are junkie spaceman Reptiloid, named Dr. Ping. You need to capture energy generator to become a ruler or maybe destroyer of this planet, full of priests and demons.

Enjoy!

11/10/2018 hot fix: We fixed bug, when main character fall through floor

10/10/2018 update: We disabled debug mode in html5 version

To run this game on PC you should download archive, extract it and run

Warning!!!

If you run game in browser (for me it is Opera), you may see that some file couldn't be finding. It is terrible, however it isn't THE END. You can download this game!
